text: Mišo Cebalo (6 February 1945 – 2 September 2022) was a Croatian chess Grandmaster. He won the 19th World Senior Chess Championship at Condino 2009. In 2011 he was awarded the title of FIDE Senior Trainer. Cebalo died on 2 September 2022 in Zagreb, Croatia at the age of 77.Preminuo velemajstor Mišo Cebalo ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Croatian sportspeople Category:Chess grandmasters Category:People from Zagreb
title: Mišo Cebalo
